summary: The prince of Denmark sets out to woo the proud princess of Illyria, but when she rejects him he takes her away by force and makes her to live a humble life until her pride is overcome.
cast: Birgitte Price|Hans W. Petersen|Peter Steen|Ove Sprogøe|Gunnar Lauring|Preben Lerdorff Rye|Hardy Rafn|Vigga Bro|Kai Holm|Gerda Madsen|Edouard Mielche|Henry Nielsen|Dirch Passer|Sisse Reingaard|Grethe Sønck|Volmer Sørensen|Cleo Jensen|Ulrik Neumann|Marianne Flor|Peer Guldbrandsen|Lotte Horne|Mogens Lind|Dorte Passer|James Price|Elsebeth Reingaard|Jonna Hjerl|Inga Ranthe|Ulla Johansson|Bente Juul|Vibeke Drachmann Buemann|Lise Henningsen|Agnete Didrichsen|Birgitte Didrichsen|David Jackson|Walt Rosenberg|Kjeld Nørgaard|Tage Axelson|Birgit Sandberg|Jørgen Blaksted|Jens Due|Jørgen Green|Niels Hinrichsen|Stig Hoffmeyer|Lene Maimu|Arne Seldorf|Lizzi Varencke
title: Der var engang
